| HistoryText             = The Unites States Army formed the Mercury Team after Agent Venom went AWOL. The group is composed of four soldiers from different military branches, all who use symbiotes from the now separated Hybrid symbiote. Each member uses their respective symbiote for a specific purpose, and are used as a deterrent in black ops missions and symbiote related scenarios. The team was sent to fight [[Cletus Kasady (Earth-616)|Carnage]] when the villain tried to take over Doverton, Colorado.{{r|Carnage, U.S.A. Vol 1 2|5}}

[[File:Mercury Team (Earth-616) and Carnage (Symbiote) (Earth-616) from Deadpool vs. Carnage Vol 1 3 0001.jpg|thumb|left|Death]]
All of their human members were killed by [[Cletus Kasady (Earth-616)|Carnage]] after the criminal encountered the ghost town their secret base was located at by chance during his murderous journey around the United States.{{r|Deadpool vs. Carnage Vol 1 3}}
